rules_text:
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Each opponent loses 3 life and you gain 3 life.
When this card is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may pay {1}{G}. If you do, return it to the battlefield as a copy of a basic land you control.
